results.title: Lost
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A girl finds herself entrapped in a bizarre fantasy land when she goes to a park and is invited to play by a group of ghostly figures…is it real, or just part of a dream?

results.title: Kyrie
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A student called Jack is being framed by another student at his school, who accuses him of stealing his girlfriend. Jack has his exam papers forged, gets drawn into fights and is generally stalked by the jealous boyfriend. Jack cannot seem to prove his innocence and is blamed for everything by the principal of the school who doesn’t believe his stories of persecution….he later finds out why…the girl in question is the school principal’s daughter.

results.title: The Hot date
results.brief_description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival. A put upon adolescent is faced with the unusual problem of potential self-combustion whenever he gets nervous. As a result, his fear is palpable when it comes to his first date. His reluctance is soon overcome as things go well and he decides to invite his love into the bedroom…what happens next is surprising and hilarious!

results.title: Half sister
results.brief_description: Half Sister tells of a seven-year-old boy’s fascination at watching, from the shadows, his rebellious, 16-year-old half sister undress after glamming herself up for a high school production, ignoring her father’s furious pounding on the bathroom door.

results.title: Genre
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A day in the life of a blocked screenwriter. A film producer is harassing a screenwriter who is suffering major problems trying to come up with a script for his next movie. This short film visually depicts the film scenarios this writer conjures up - a mystery and gangster style thriller. Neither of these stories satisfy the frustrated screenwriter, and so he ends up writing a simple love story between two ordinary people. Finally he finishes the script and rushes to the post box to send his script to the producer. Upon arriving at the letter box, he meets the woman of his dreams. His screenwriting dreams become a reality.

results.title: Directors of the future
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A ‘mokumentary’ following the trials and tribulations of future ‘Star Director’ Izabella Dazs’ career. We begin the film as she is formulating an idea for her film and we finish by seeing her end product, “Les pommes du mal”.

results.title: Cuttlefish dreams: Hyper parsnip bitches
results.brief_description: This high energy animation looks and feels like an arcade game experience. Jumping, kicking characters fight a gory path through a series of game worlds battling a series of ‘evil freaks’. And there’s cuttlefish
